meanings.definition: Ornamental bordering on a stringed instrument, typically made of wood or ivory.
meanings.sent1: The purflings on the violin added a touch of elegance to its appearance.
meanings.sent2: The luthier carefully crafted the purflings on the guitar to enhance its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The purflings on the cello decided to throw a party to celebrate their new design.
meanings.sent4: The purflings on the viola danced along the edges, bringing life to the instrument.
meanings.sent5: As the musician played, the purflings seemed to shimmer in the light, mesmerizing the audience.

meanings.definition: The act of adding decorative borders to a musical instrument.
meanings.sent1: She learned the art of purflings to enhance the appearance of her violin.
meanings.sent2: The workshop specialized in purflings, creating unique designs for each instrument.
meanings.sent3: The purflings decided to go on strike until they received better working conditions.
meanings.sent4: His skill in purflings transformed ordinary instruments into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The purflings were like the final brushstrokes on a masterpiece, completing the instrument's look.
